DetailMain.sql: INSERT INTO travelorderdb.tab_services ( UserID, ServiceTypeID, ServiceName, PrimaryPrice, Unit, PriceType, ServiceTime, ServiceOutTimePrice, IncMileage, ExMileagePrice, FreeForDelay, WaitOutTimePrice, Description, ServiceStatus, ServiceMethod, UpdateDate, CreateDate ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),NOW() )

Picture.sql: INSERT INTO traveluserdb.tab_facilitypictures ( PictureID, PicURL, IsCover, PicType ) VALUES (?,?,?,1)
